EmailTemplate.name: 02 – Repeat winners
EmailTemplate.subject: What’s new for Five Star award winners
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Informalname__c},
Congratulations on your selection as one of the 2015 Five Star {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Profession__c}s. The special section will be appearing in the {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Month__c} {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Issue_s__c} of {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Magazine__c}.
We are excited that you have the opportunity to appear in the award section again this year. Last year we updated updated our research process to provide new opportunities for you, your clients and your colleagues to participate, and we received great feedback from other Five Star {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Profession__c}s.
I want to answer any questions you have about how you were chosen for the award. If you have a few minutes to talk, please send me an email with a time that works best for you, or call me at your convenience.
I look forward to speaking with you soon.
{!User.Name}
Account Manager
Five Star Professional
2900 Lone Oak Parkway
Suite 120
Eagan, MN 55121
Direct: {!User.Phone}
Main: 1-888-438-5782
Fax: 651-259-1940
{!User.Email} www.fivestarprofessional.com
